summary: This document is a Uniform Residential Loan Application for a mortgage loan amounting to $320,000. It includes detailed information about the borrower and co-borrower, their employment, income, assets, and liabilities, as well as the property information. The application is significant as it outlines the financial background of the applicants and their intentions regarding the property.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is identified as the loan originator for the application, responsible for processing the loan request.

locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The loan application is for a mortgage amount of $320,000.
The property is located at 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202.
The application was submitted on October 2, 2014.
Joann Brown is the loan originator associated with this application.
The document includes detailed financial information about the borrower and co-borrower, including income, assets, and liabilities.
